page.title: 11RELIGION
page.content: Although lacking a purpose-built place of worship there are four main denominations of the Christian faith in this area:- {CHURCH OF SCOTLAND About 150 people attend services at either Kilmadock Church in Doune, Norrieston Church in Thornhill, or Kincardine in Menteith Church, Blairdrummond. A service is held on Sunday afternoons during term time in Deanston School. {CHRISTIAN BRETHERN Members and friends attend the Gospel Hall meetings in Doune. {ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH About 10 members of this faith go to the Church of St. Fillans and Alphonsus in Doune. {THE EPISCOPAL CHURCH IN SCOTLAND About 25 members from the area attend St. Modoc's Church in Doune.
